title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.17 - Riding without license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.17 - Riding without license

State Regulations

Persons never having ridden in a race may be allowed to
ride twice before applying for a license, if approved by the steward of the
commission; but licenses shall not be granted to persons who have never ridden
in a race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4002.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
